title: " Beware of death as a renegade '
subtitle: Rumors are claiming the prophecy on the captain. A witness from Homayon Khan's tomb refers to him as a "retrospective" rooted in ISIS propaganda.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A witness to the grave of the late commander of the United States Army Homayon Khan (son of Kheser Khan, spokesman for DNA) refers to his "death as a recidivist."
